title: New drug for relief of cold symptoms

content.prompt: Researchers will use a well-designed experiment to test the effectiveness of a new drug versus a placebo in relieving symptoms of the common cold. Which of the following will provide evidence that the new drug causes relief of symptoms?

choices.label: The experiment cannot be used to show the new drug causes relief, only that it is related to relief.
Any difference between the responses to the new drug and the placebo provides evidence that the new drug causes relief.
The experiment cannot be used to show the new drug causes relief because the new drug is not being compared to an older drug.
The difference between the responses to the new drug and the placebo must be shown to be statistically significant to provide evidence that the new drug causes relief.
Relief of symptoms would need to occur in all subjects who take the new drug and in none of the subjects who take the placebo to provide evidence that the new drug causes relief.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
